attributes.action: Reduce the tuition fees on science courses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I despair at the fact that the news often tells us that the country is falling behind scientifically; and yet budding scientists can no longer afford to pay for study.

Given the choice, I would be a science teacher - I would be studying for it right now... but given that students are now graduating with debt in excess of 30,000 - there is no way I can afford to follow this dream.  I wonder how many other budding scientists (not to mention their work) are being held back by such extortionate costs.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reduce the tuition fees on science courses."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15205.asp
